<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mariner's Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=2434) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface. You can cast the [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. You can cast this cantrip underwater.
name: Mariner's Fire
